code: export var ADD_TO_CART="::ADD_TO_CART::";export var CLEAR_CART="::CLEAR_CART::";export var CHANGE_QUANITY="::CHANGE_QUANTITY::";export var addToCart=function addToCart(ID,gender,type,name,price,image,size,color){return{type:ADD_TO_CART,payload:{ID:ID,gender:gender,type:type,name:name,price:price,image:image,size:size,color:color}};};export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return{type:CLEAR_CART};};export var changeQuantity=function changeQuantity(ID,quantity){return{type:CHANGE_QUANITY,payload:{ID:ID,quantity:quantity}};};
